text: Fred Wallace Haise, Jr. (born November 14, 1933) is an American engineer and former NASA astronaut. He is one of only 24 humans to have flown to the Moon. Having flown on Apollo 13, Haise was to be the sixth human to walk on the Moon, but the mission did not land due to a failure aboard the spacecraft. He was born on November 14, 1933 in Biloxi, Mississippi.* ==References== ==Other websites== *Spacefacts biography of Fred Haise *Short audio interview on Astrotalkuk.org during his visit to UK in 2009 Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:American astronauts Category:Apollo astronauts Category:Scientists from Massachusetts Category:Scientists from Mississippi Category:People from Biloxi, Mississippi
title: Fred Haise
